title: ophcrack-xp-livecd-2.3.0.iso
description:
Ophcrack is a free Windows password remover based on rainbow tables. It is a very efficient implementation of rainbow tables done by the inventors of the method. It comes with a Graphical User Interface and runs on multiple platforms. 

The latest version of ophcrack LiveCD is 2.3.0 (including ophcrack 3.3.0)
This is a Live CD, meaning that it is a BOOT Disc, can be used if you have forgotten your logon information.

Instructions: Burn ISO to CD and set computer to boot from disc and restart.
